title: Ketu Transit in the 3rd House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your third house brings detachment from excessive communication, constant movement, and the need for external validation through effort. Motivation to prove yourself may feel reduced, yet inner courage develops quietly. Interactions with siblings or close contacts can become distant or minimal. This phase favors selective action, depth over noise, and skill refinement without display. When embraced consciously, Ketu here strengthens inner confidence and purposeful communication.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Reduced urge to constantly express or explain.

sections.heading: Career
points: Less interest in sales or promotion-heavy roles.
Independent tasks suit better than teamwork.
Progress comes through mastery, not visibility.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Income linked to effort feels secondary.

closing: Ketu in the 3rd house refines effort into purpose. When noise fades, true strength becomes visible within.
